com.jurajmasar.ib.dossier.files

Class DirectAccessFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jurajmasar.ib.dossier.files.DirectAccessFile

  • public class DirectAccessFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides manipulation of random access files
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Juraj Masar

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DirectAccessFile(java.lang.String fileName, long recordLength)
      constructor for objects of class DirectAccessFile opens file for reading & writing or throws an I/O exception

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void append(java.lang.String s)
      appends string to the end of the file
      void close()
      closes the pointer to the random access file or throws an exception
      boolean delete(long position)
      Deletes the currect record.
      long getLength()
      returns length of the file in bytes or throws an I/O exception
      long getNumberOfRecords()
      according to file length and length of one record it returns num.
      long getRecordLength()
      returns length of one record
      void goToRecord(long i)
      moves the file pointer to a different record or throws an exception
      boolean isReady()
      checks if the file is ready for manipulation
      java.lang.String read()
      reads and returns string - content of current record or throws an exception
      java.lang.String read(long record)
      reads and returns string - content of record given or throws an exception
      void shortenFile()
      shortens file to the current number of records - the rest of the file is cut off or throws an exception
      void write(java.lang.String s)
      writes string to the current record or throws an exception
      void write(java.lang.String s, long record)
      writes string to the record given or throws an exception
